name: Echoes (itch) (ojaoweir)
description:
In Echoes you play as a AI-agent in a simulation to perfect an upcoming heist.
The goals are to collect the artifacts (represented by green squares in our simulation), eliminating any foes (represented as red triangles) and return to the exit.

Get in
Collect the artifacts
Get out

Controls:
WASD to move
Mouse to aim
R to restart simulation when you die


-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
This is my entry to the Brackeys 22.1 Gake Jam
The theme was It is not real
